wikipedia_page.main:
Bernard Boverton Redwood (28 November 1874 – 28 September 1911) was a British motorboat racer who competed in the 1908 Summer Olympics.As crew member of the Gyrinus he won two gold medals in the only motor boat competitions at the Olympics.
His father was Sir Thomas Boverton Redwood, 1st Baronet.
